long_description: Learn the art of knot tying with one of these handy kits. Three versions are available: Boater's Knots, Camper's Knots and Fishing Knots. Teaches basic and complex knots that will be of use to anyone who spends time in the outdoors. Includes 50 fully illustrated knot cards, instructions on how to tie each knot, interesting facts on how the knots are used, and tying equipment. May be played as a game or simply used for reference. All tying equipment included.
